Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Fit the pie crust into an 8-inch pie dish.
Combine maple syrup, brown sugar, evaporated milk, and beaten eggs in a bowl until well blended, then pour the mixture into the pie crust.
Bake the pie in the oven until the center is mostly set, approximately 45 minutes. Allow the pie to cool until the center has started to fully set, around 30 minutes more.
Select dark or amber maple syrup over light maple syrup.
